name: Darin Cassler
content: The most popular front-end framework for developing responsive, mobile first projects on the web.

name: Emma Cassler
content: jQuery is a fast, small, and feature-rich JavaScript library. It makes things like HTML document traversal and manipulation, event handling, animation, and Ajax much simpler with an easy-to-use API

name: Jeff Bridges
content: AngularJS lets you extend HTML vocabulary for your application. The resulting environment is extraordinarily expressive, readable, and quick to develop.
